params._block: Block to calculate the voting power at

params._t: Epoch time to return voting power at

params._unlockTime: Epoch time when tokens unlock, rounded down to whole weeks*

depositFor(address,uint256).details: Anyone (even a smart contract) can deposit for someone else, but cannot extend their locktime and deposit for a brand new user

params._value: Amount to add to user's lock*
Amount of tokens to deposit and add to the lock*

returns._0: Epoch time of the lock end*

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._flag: True to allow or false to disallow

params._block: Block to calculate the total voting power at

params.t: Time to calculate the total voting power at

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw().details: Only possible if the lock has expired*

balanceOf(address).notice: Get the current voting power for `msg.sender`

balanceOfB(address,uint256).notice: Measure voting power of `addr` at block height `_block`

createLock(uint256,uint256).notice: Deposit `_value` tokens for `msg.sender` and lock until `_unlock_time`

depositFor(address,uint256).notice: Deposit `_value` tokens for `_addr` and add to the lock

getLastUserSlope(address).notice: Get the most recently recorded rate of voting power decrease for `addr`

increaseAmount(uint256).notice: Deposit `_value` additional tokens for `msg.sender` without modifying the unlock time

increaseUnlockTime(uint256).notice: Extend the unlock time for `msg.sender` to `_unlock_time`

setWhitelist(address[],bool).notice: Sets a list of users who are allowed/denied to deposit

totalSupplyB(uint256).notice: Calculate total voting power at some point in the past

userPointHistoryTs(address,uint256).notice: Get the timestamp for checkpoint `_idx` for `_addr`
